steps.name: the user goes to the ebay homepage
selects the gift card from the deals and sales drop-down menu in the top bar
click all filters button

elements.name: The user should be able to list the products that meet the desired conditions and add them to the basket

steps.name: clicks on the price and enters "500" and "1000"
clicks on the item position and enters the "10 km" distance
clicks delivery options and enters "Free Postage"
clicks on the show only and prefer "Sale items", "Deals & Savings" and "Accepts Best offer"
clicks on the seller and click "Sellers with eBay Stores"
verifies the conditions
clicks apply button

elements.name: Verify that the user has added the product to the basket

steps.name: clicks on the price and enters "500" and "1000"
clicks on the item position and enters the "10 km" distance
clicks delivery options and enters "Free Postage"
clicks on the show only and prefer "Accepts Best offer"
clicks on the seller and click "Sellers with eBay Stores"
clicks apply button
clicks "first product"
clicks add to cart
verifies that the product has been added to the basket
closes all the pages
